verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
God is so good,
God is so good,
God is so good,
He’s so good to me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He took my sin,
He took my sin,
He took my sin,
He’s so good to me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Now I am free,
Now I am free,
Now I am free,
He’s so good to me.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
God is so good,
He took my sin,
Now I am free,
He’s so good to me.
